languages.text: Величественная статуя сурово взирает на мостик, денно и нощно наблюдая за трудами слуг Бога-Императора во славу Его.
The majestic statue glowers sternly over the bridge, unceasingly watching the servants of the God-Emperor toil for His glory.
languages.original_text: Величественная статуя сурово взирает на мостик, денно и нощно наблюдая за трудами слуг Бога-Императора во славу Его.

traits.locale_text: The majestic statue glowers sternly over the bridge, as if watching the servants of the God-Emperor toil for His glory.
The majestic statue glowers sternly over the bridge, as if watching the servants of the God-Emperor toil for His glory.
The majestic statue glowers sternly over the bridge, as if watching the servants of the God-Emperor toil for His glory.
The majestic statue glowers sternly over the bridge, unceasingly watching the servants of the God-Emperor toil for His glory.
The majestic statue glowers sternly over the bridge, unceasingly watching the servants of the God-Emperor toil for His glory.

languages.text: Die majestätische Statue blickt streng über die Brücke, als würde sie rastlos darüber wachen, dass die Diener des Gottimperators auch fleißig zu seinen Ehren schuften.
languages.original_text: The majestic statue glowers sternly over the bridge, unceasingly watching the servants of the God-Emperor toil for His glory.

traits.locale_text: Die majestätische Statue blickt streng über die Brücke, als würde sie darüber wachen, dass die Diener des Gottimperators auch fleißig zu seinen Ehren schuften.

languages.text: La statue majestueuse jette un regard sévère sur la passerelle, surveillant les serviteurs de l'Empereur-Dieu pendant qu'ils œuvrent pour Sa gloire.
languages.original_text: The majestic statue glowers sternly over the bridge, unceasingly watching the servants of the God-Emperor toil for His glory.

traits.locale_text: La statue majestueuse jette un regard sévère sur la passerelle, comme si elle surveillait les serviteurs de l'Empereur-Dieu pendant qu'ils œuvrent pour Sa gloire.

languages.text: 这座雄伟的雕像在桥上严厉地凝视着下面的一切，每时每刻都在观看神皇的仆人为了祂的荣耀而辛勤劳作。
languages.original_text: The majestic statue glowers sternly over the bridge, unceasingly watching the servants of the God-Emperor toil for His glory.

traits.locale_text: 这座雄伟的雕像在桥上严厉地凝视着下面的一切，仿佛在认真看着神皇的仆人为了祂的荣耀而辛勤劳作。

languages.text: La majestuosa estatua observa severa el puente, contemplando eternamente a los súbditos del Dios Emperador trabajar para su gloria.
languages.original_text: The majestic statue glowers sternly over the bridge, unceasingly watching the servants of the God-Emperor toil for His glory.

traits.locale_text: La majestuosa estatua observa severa el puente, como si contemplara a los súbditos del Dios Emperador trabajar para su gloria.

languages.text: 威厳のある像がブリッジを厳しく睨みつけている。神帝陛下の従者たちがその栄光のためにあくせく働く様を、絶え間なく見張っているかのようだ。
languages.original_text: The majestic statue glowers sternly over the bridge, unceasingly watching the servants of the God-Emperor toil for His glory.

traits.locale_text: 威厳のある像がブリッジを厳しく睨みつけている。神帝陛下の従者たちがその栄光のためにあくせく働く様を、絶え間なく見張っているかのようだ。

languages.text: Sert bakışlarıyla köprüyü gözetleyen görkemli heykel, Tanrı İmparator'un hizmetkârlarının O'nun yüceliği uğruna çalışmalarını izliyor.
languages.original_text: The majestic statue glowers sternly over the bridge, unceasingly watching the servants of the God-Emperor toil for His glory.
